experiences.description: Led the development and evolution of the support platform for partner restaurants, integrating tech, design and Customer Success. Focused on reducing emergency requests, implementing scalable solutions and reflecting the evolution of critical problems in the product. Led the redesign of the bank data change process, prioritizing fraud prevention and improving security.

Worked on developing responsive and accessible web interfaces for millions of users. Used modern technologies like React and Tailwind CSS, optimizing performance and implementing scalable design systems.
Developed scalable APIs for cloud service integration using Node.js and Azure. Implemented optimizations that reduced response time by 30%, improving internal systems efficiency.
Built highly scalable e-commerce solutions, ensuring high availability and service security. Helped create new features to enhance user experience and improve platform conversion metrics.
